originalText.text: Being the owner of property in New York City , I have a comprehensive list of minor and major house fixes that require immediate attention. However, my preferred handyman moved states away, leaving me stranded. After taking some time to investigate several options, I found an alternative service provider who came promptly. The work was completed with no difficulties, and he did two of the most critical repairs that were on my list. I appreciate the professionalism, orderliness, and promptness of the work done; I’m expecting to use their services again.

I appreciate the professionalism, orderliness, and promptness of the work done; I’m expecting to use their services again.

originalText.text: Do yourself a favour, call this guy for your paint jobs (and other handyman jobs). Although this fixer took slightly longer to paint our kid’s attic, over two days, it was because he painted it properly and this is the process, painters’ tape was laid for extra surety on straight lines, first fixed all the cracks in our walls, washed the walls, primed it, used such fabulous paint. My partner and I just loved how seriously he took the job.

originalText.text: Great communication throughout and eagerness to help. Alex helped us with a painting project on our new home and other misc repairs. It was nice that he was always open to talking and gave his honest input. He and his crew worked hard and Alex always made sure we were happy with everything at the end.

recently had new windows
installed, and needed some
exterior paint touch up to match
the new windows and doors, as
well as several other miscellaneous exterior projects. I called Alex after reading the great reviews here on google . His office
answered my call the same
afternoon, came over the
following day for a quote, and we
scheduled the work within 2 days.
His price was very reasonable.
Thank you

originalText.text: We got our basement remodelled using Alex  and his team. He first “interviewed” us about exactly how we were going to use this space. He drafted a quick design for us and gave us plenty of opportunity to make adjustments and “play”. He then superimposed the plumbing and electric plans onto our design and let us know where any changes needed to happen. He was sure to include us in any major decisions but also just got on with things. We had so much fun working with Alex  and his team!
